content: corina cook s designs © 2018 - fly eagles fly hat http //www ravelry com/designers/corina-cook fly eagles fly hat pattern © corina cook 2018 yarns used kraemer perfection worsted weight 30% domestic merino 70% acrylic gentle wash tumble dry colors used a white fluff 1504 b green alligator 1506 tools used size 7 16 circular needle size 8 16 circular needle size 8 double pointed needles yarn needle for finishing gauge 18 stitches and 23 row = 4 one size - 23 for adult male or female emblazon your team spirit on your hat with the rousing eagles fight song words fly eagles fly using white and midnight green and simple-to-follow stranded colorwork create a hat that is a surefire hit for any philly football fan this is the year baby we re going to the super bowl corina cook s designs © 2018 - fly eagles fly hat http //www ravelry com/designers/corina-cook using the size 7 circulars cast on 92 stitches using a 2-color cast on knot not too tight it will be undone when finished the white and green yarns together and lay the knot atop your size 7 needle the two yarns should be straddling the needle with the green strand on your thumb and the white on your pointer finger using the long tail method cast on 92 stitches do not count the knot as a stitch slip it off the end before joining place marker and knit the first stitch when the allotted number is cast on do not count the knot as a stitch slip it off the end before joining place marker and knit the first stitch i also did a video tutorial to make learning this technique a little bit easier https //youtu be/gw5dvcy0bg8 hat brim rounds 1-2 * k1 p1 around with green rnds 3-4 *k1 p1 around with white repeat rounds 1-4 for a total of 12 rounds with 6 stripes body use white only until the chart begins round 1 knit round 2 purl round 11 switch to size 8 needles knit round 17 begin knitting with two colors working the chart from right to left as numbered the 46 stitch motif will be worked twice around each row for the total of 92 round 32 cut green leaving tail to weave it knit with white only rounds 33-35 knit corina cook s designs © 2018 - fly eagles fly hat http //www ravelry com/designers/corina-cook when working decrease rounds switch to double pointed needles when necessary round 36 *k8 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 37 knit round 38 *k7 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 39 knit round 40 *k6 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 41 knit round 42 *k5 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 43 knit round 44 *k4 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 45 knit round 46 *k3 k2tog repeat from * around end k2 round 47 knit round 48 *k2 k2tog repeat
